janus.system¶

Classes

Buffer(ID) A class to store information for buffer groups from aqmmm computations such as what atoms are contained in the buffer group, the switching function, COM coordinates, etc.
System(qm_indices, qm_residues, run_ID[, …]) A system class that stores system information such as energy, forces, and positions for each region of a system at a particular point Stores qmmm and aqmmm information as well.
